backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping requested layout and navigation changes to affected frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of all frontend components and data files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes using custom OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component composing header, sections, and footer, ending after Skills.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Galler: Grid component rendering gallery thumbnails with hover effects and click-to-open behavior.
Modal lightbox showing full-size gallery images with title and caption.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Sectio: Reusable section header with optional eyebrow and subtitle and configurable alignment.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/sectio: About section presenting four content-creator highlights in a card grid.
Renders the contact section with email, phone, location, resume download, and social links using data from contactInfo.
Displays a list of experience cards showing job titles, organizations, periods, descriptions, and highlights.
Shows a gallery grid and lightbox for portfolio items with selectable images.
Provides the landing hero section with intro text, background image, and buttons that smooth-scroll to skills and experience.
Lists service offerings as cards with icons, titles, and descriptions based on services data.
Displays skill categories with labeled badges sourced from skillCategories.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/SiteFo: Footer with portfolio summary, quick links, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/SiteHe: Sticky responsive header with smooth-scroll navigation and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/data/portfolio.ts: Defines interfaces and provides static portfolio data for services, experiences, skills, gallery items, and contact info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context with login, clear, and identity persistence using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting that no backend queries exist and data is client-managed.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors from CSS variables, container settings, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, and a pending request to remove sections after Skills & Expertise.
